item.title: Version 1.1.2 (build 1)
item.description:
What's New in 1.1.2

  • Removed Wake-on-LAN: WOL support removed for reliability; wake and unlock the other Mac manually before connecting
  • Cleaned up About pane: Removed social links for a cleaner settings UI
  • Connect-all reliability: Fixed retry failures and first-attempt issues when connecting all devices

item.title: Version 1.1.1 (build 11)
item.description:
What's New in 1.1.1 (build 11)

WOL & Connect-All Reliability

  • Hardened Wake-on-LAN: More reliable peer waking with improved diagnostics
  • Fixed connect-all flow: Resolved retry failures and first-attempt issues when connecting all devices
  • Better error recovery: Connect-all now ensures initial connection succeeds before proceeding

item.title: Version 1.1.1 (build 10)
item.description:
What's New in 1.1.1 (build 10)

Bluetooth Reliability

  • Retry logic for release operations: Unpair, disconnect, and power-off now retry once on failure for more reliable device handoffs
  • Connection verification: Dual-probe verification (with retries) confirms devices are actually connected or disconnected after operations
  • Separated single/batch power-on tracking: Single-device and batch flows no longer cancel each other's Bluetooth power-on timers
  • Adaptive batch timeouts: Fallback delays now scale with number of released devices for better multi-device reliability
  • Stale task protection: Token-based guards prevent outdated fallback tasks from firing unexpectedly

item.title: Version 1.1.1 (build 9)
item.description:
What's New in 1.1.1 (build 9)

Smarter Network Awareness

  • Subnet-aware Wake-on-LAN: WOL only offered when peer is on the same network
  • New "Sleeping Devices" section: Clear separation of wakeable devices in menu
  • New "Out of Network" section: Guidance when Macs are on different networks
  • Better batch connect: Zero-release protection and partial success handling
  • Reduced false negatives: Enhanced Bluetooth ownership checks during state transitions

item.title: Version 1.1.1 (build 8)
item.description:
What's New in 1.1.1 (build 8)

Faster Error Feedback

  • Reduced error wait times: Worst-case error display reduced from 57s to 25-35s through parallel operations
  • Parallel WOL + acquire: Wake-on-LAN now runs simultaneously with device requests (saves 10-15s)
  • Smarter zombie detection: Probes discovered peers as hints for earlier zombie recovery
  • Better status feedback: More granular progress messages during device switching
  • Background health monitoring: Advisory-only peer health checks for improved reliability

item.title: Version 1.1.1 (build 7)
item.description:
What's New in 1.1.1 (build 7)

Network Robustness

  • Improved discovery timing: Increased wait times for more reliable device detection
  • Fixed Bonjour race condition: Resolved browser initialization timing issue
  • Better WOL offline detection: More accurate sleep/offline state identification

item.title: Version 1.1.1 (build 6)
item.description:
What's New in 1.1.1 (build 6)

Reliability Improvements

  • Zombie peer detection: Better handling of stale device connections
  • Partial sleep fixes: Improved detection when devices enter low-power states
  • Faster failure detection: Reduced timing for identifying unresponsive peers

item.title: Version 1.1.1 (build 5)
item.description:
What's New in 1.1.1 (build 5)

Wake-on-LAN Improvements

  • Faster wake times: Proactive WOL fires immediately when menu opens
  • Accurate errors: Shows real error cause instead of generic "Couldn't wake"
  • Smarter detection: No false "Sleeping" labels during discovery
  • No WOL spam: 60-second cooldown prevents duplicate wake attempts
  • Smoother UI: No more flicker when rapidly opening/closing menu

item.title: Version 1.1.0
item.description:
What's New in 1.1.0

  • Notification improvements
  • Improved device discovery during menu bar icon open
  • Automatic update checks every 4 hours
